name: Dark Digitales Register
description:
Dark mode for the school register used in south tyrol.
If you want to contribute, change, fix something feel free to do so and contact me through my website or Discord.
Also important note: No. It's plain CSS, it's not going to change the way you communicate with the servers, it's not going to magically make a 10 appear in you grades.

https://denismignanelli.now.sh/
additional_info:
- 1.6 (16/04/2020)
  style now turns on/off depending on weather the system is in light or dark mode

- 1.5 (29/03/2020)
  added support for https://sogym-fotour.digitalesregister.it/

- 1.4 (19/03/2020)
  fixed text in messages

- 1.3 (17/03/2020)
  fixed upload file dialog window/popup
  fixed some input fields

- 1.2 (16/03/2020)
  fixed language input and file input

- 1.1 (16/03/2020)
  added support for the following domain: https://gymme.digitalesregister.it/

- 1.0 (15/03/2020)
  released to public
  NOTE: The theme is currently only available on the following domains:
  https://fos-meran.digitalesregister.it/
  https://wfokafka.digitalesregister.it/
  https://sogym-fotour.digitalesregister.it/
  https://gymme.digitalesregister.it/
